feed.title: 0x3ashry's Blog
feed.subtitle: CyberSecurity geek's blog, who wants to share his day-to-day knowledge

entry.title: Driver — Hack The Box [Write-up]
entry.summary: Driver is an easy rated HTB Windows machine, but it discussed a new techniques in exploiting SMB shares and winRM service in addition to privesc using CVE-2021-34527 - PrintNightmare LPE (PowerShell). Let’s get started. Used Tools: Nmap Metasploit Hashcat Evil-winrm Invoke-WebRequest 1. SCANNING & ENUMERATION I will start with nmap and the -A parameter to enable OS dete...

entry.title: BYUCTF 2022 [Write-up]
entry.summary: BYUCTF was a CTF organized by CSA - Cybersecurity Student Association during the period of May 27th to May 28th. We proudly got 5th Place among 435 Competing Teams. Web - Wordle Wordle was an easy web challange that is inspired from the Wordle game. Basically the game rules is that there is an English 5-letter word you must guess it through try and error, You have only 6 tries. In eac...

entry.title: Nest — Hack The Box [Write-up]
entry.summary: Nest is one of the most challenging easy machines on HTB including a lot of new aspects as cryptography, de-compiling .Net application and extensive work with SMB shares. So let’s get started… Used Tools: nmap smbmap smbclient mount telnet psexec.py 1. SCANNING & ENUMERATION I will start with nmap and the -A parameter to enable OS detection, version detection, script scan...

entry.title: Networked — Hack The Box [Write-up]
entry.summary: Networked is an easy rated Linux retired machine, with a white-box pentesting to exploit an upload vulnerability and get user privilege and then exploiting Redhat/CentOS network-scripts vulnerability to get root. Let’s get started. Used Tools: nmap gobuster tar netcat touch 1. SCANNING & ENUMERATION I will start with nmap and the -A parameter to enable OS detection, version...

entry.title: Poison — Hack The Box [Write-up]
entry.summary: Poison is a Medium rated FreeBSD retired box, but an enjoyable one with easy user access and good privesc. Let’s get started. Used Tools: Nmap Cyberchef Unzip SSH Wget Linpeas.sh 1.
